query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST951N AS T1 USING ( SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#YYYYMM# AS VARCHAR(6)) AS YYYYMM, CAST(#PJT# AS VARCHAR(6)) AS PJT, CAST(#HNO# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS HNO FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) AS T2 ON T1.MANDT = T2.MANDT AND T1.YYYYMM = T2.YYYYMM AND T1.PJT = T2.PJT AND T1.HNO = T2.HNO
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BSU = #BSU# ,STO = #STO# ,TGB = #TGB# ,FM = #FM# ,HRTS = #HRTS# ,HEP = #HEP# ,SLA = #SLA# ,GNO = #GNO#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ( MANDT ,YYYYMM ,PJT ,HNO ,BSU ,STO ,TGB ,FM ,HRTS ,HEP ,SLA ,GNO ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# ,CAST(#YYYYMM# AS VARCHAR(6)) ,#PJT# ,#HNO# ,#BSU# ,#STO# ,#TGB# ,#FM# ,#HRTS# ,#HEP# ,#SLA# ,#GNO# )
